translation.Message_0_Page_0: Back on land I worked on motorcycles and often drove them. After the Virus struck Rio, my motorcycle was banged up by raiders and zombies.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: It's too dangerous for me to look for the supplies to fix the bike, so I've been looking for somebody who can.
translation.Response_0: I can help you fix your motorcycle.
translation.Response_1: I can't help at the moment.
